children.structure_process: 1. Sprint Planning → 2. Sprint Execution → 3. Daily Standup → 4. Sprint Review → 5. Sprint Retrospective

children.examples: Scrum software team, Agile marketing campaign, DevOps sprint

children.terminology: 1. Sprint Planning → Define sprint goals, select backlog items
2. Sprint Execution → Development and implementation of sprint tasks
3. Daily Standup → Short team synchronization meeting
4. Sprint Review → Demonstrate completed work to stakeholders
5. Sprint Retrospective → Reflect and improve process
